attributes.action: Lower the prices of football tickets in the Football League..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I want to start a petition to get lower ticket prices in the football league..

I think it is shocking that at times, we have to pay £18 to watch league 2 football..

You can watch premiership football for as less as £15..

I know i'd love to stay and watch Lincoln, but to be fair, i'm contemplating watching better quality football, for a lower price..

So i'm asking you to sign this petition which will be presented to the football league, to reduce the ticket prices for next season..

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
